note: Like many of us I came to Mastodon because of the takeover in the other place. I don't feel as comfortable as many of you here because the reason I'm on social media atm is not for social reasons but to add my voice to those who oppose Brexit and the rise of the right. Which frankly isn't what social media is supposed to be about is it? As a result I may not post much myself but I promise to boost everyone else's posts
